QuestData.Title: Storming the Beaches
QuestData.Description: Now that those humans are out of our hair for a bit, we can move on to more pressing matters.$b$bThe cataclysm utterly decimated Durotar's eastern coast. You saw the wreckage that it made of Tiragarde. The devastation was even worse on the coast to the east of here.$b$bAfter the first wave, the beach was overtaken by angry elementals that came from the sea. I sent grunts to take care of it, but the onslaught was too much. I'm guessing you'll have a little more luck than they did.$b$bBeware the tides!
QuestData.CompletionText: Return to the beach and finish the job!
QuestData.RewardText: The scent of the sea hangs about you, $n. Your efforts may have purchased another day for Razor Hill.$b$bI will pass word of your deeds up my chain of command. You have our gratitude.
